verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> and Song <WH7892> at the dedication <WH2598> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>. I will extol <WH7311> <WH8787> thee, O YY <WH3068>; for thou hast lifted me up <WH1802> <WH8765>, and hast not made my foes <WH341> <WH8802> to rejoice <WH8055> <WH8765> over me.
O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, I cried <WH7768> <WH8765> unto thee, and thou hast healed <WH7495> <WH8799> me.

O YY <WH3068>, thou hast brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> my soul <WH5315> from the grave <WH7585>: thou hast kept me alive <WH2421> <WH8765>, that I should not go down <WH3381> <WH8800> <WH8675> <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>.
Sing <WH2167> <WH8761> unto the YY <WH3068>, O ye saints <WH2623> of his, and give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> at the remembrance <WH2143> of his holiness <WH6944>.

For his anger <WH639> endureth but a moment <WH7281>; in his favour <WH7522> is life <WH2416>: weeping <WH1065> may endure <WH3885> <WH8799> for a night <WH6153>, but joy <WH7440> cometh in the morning <WH1242>.
And in my prosperity <WH7959> I said <WH559> <WH8804>, I shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.

YY <WH3068>, by thy favour <WH7522> thou hast made my mountain <WH2042> to stand <WH5975> <WH8689> strong <WH5797>: thou didst hide <WH5641> <WH8689> thy face <WH6440>, and I was troubled <WH926> <WH8737>.
I cried <WH7121> <WH8799> to thee, O YY <WH3068>; and unto the YY <WH3068> I made supplication <WH2603> <WH8691>.

What profit <WH1215> is there in my blood <WH1818>, when I go down <WH3381> <WH8800> to the pit <WH7845>? Shall the dust <WH6083> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee? shall it declare <WH5046> <WH8686> thy truth <WH571> ?
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, and have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me: YY <WH3068>, be thou my helper <WH5826> <WH8802>.
Thou hast turned <WH2015> <WH8804> for me my mourning <WH4553> into dancing <WH4234>: thou hast put off <WH6605> <WH8765> my sackcloth <WH8242>, and girded <WH247> <WH8762> me with gladness <WH8057>;

To the end that my glory <WH3519> may sing <WH2167> <WH8762> praise to thee, and not be silent <WH1826> <WH8799>. O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, I will give thanks <WH3034> <WH8686> unto thee for ever <WH5769>.
